job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtsummaryltpgtltpgtthe main function of the data scientist is to produce innovative solutions driven by exploratory data analysis from complex and highdimensional datasetsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtmust have strong sql experienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtjob responsibilitiesltpgtltpgt apply knowledge of statistics machine learning programming data modeling simulation and advanced mathematics to recognize patterns identify opportunities pose business questions and make valuable discoveries leading to prototype development and product improvementltpgtltpgt use a flexible analytical approach to design develop and evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms that lead to optimal value extraction from the dataltpgtltpgt generate and test hypotheses and analyze and interpret the results of product experimentsltpgtltpgt work with product engineers to translate prototypes into new products services and features and provide guidelines for largescale implementationltpgtltpgt provide business intelligence bi and data visualization support which includes but limited to support for the online customer service dashboards and other adhoc requests requiring data analysis and visual supportltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtskillsltpgtltpgt experienced in either programming languages such as python andor r big data tools such as hadoop or data visualization tools such as tableaultpgtltpgt the ability to communicate effectively in writing including conveying complex information and promoting indepth engagement on course topicsltpgtltpgt experience working with large datasetsltpgt
